articles.title: T-Mobile saw Verizon telling people to turn off 5G and thought ‘why stop there’ - The Verge
articles.description: T-Mobile has followed Verizon’s lead and told its customers to turn off the 5G capabilities on their phones to save battery life. The cellular company even recommends going to 2G, which would make your phone’s data unbearably slow.
articles.content:
The carrier might be all-in on 5G, but its support documents arent
Illustration by Alex Castro / The Verge
